runningCampaigns.title: Flood Relief for Noakhali
runningCampaigns.description: Help provide essential supplies and support for flood-affected families in Noakhali, Bangladesh.

runningCampaigns.title: Winter Clothing Drive
runningCampaigns.description: Donate winter clothes to keep the underprivileged warm during the cold season.

runningCampaigns.title: School Supplies for Orphans
runningCampaigns.description: Provide school supplies for orphans to support their education.
